summary: "Logan" is a 2017 superhero movie featuring Hugh Jackman as Wolverine. It's the last in a trilogy and part of the X-Men series. The story finds an older Wolverine and a sick Charles Xavier protecting a young mutant, Laura, from bad guys. The film has a dark, violent tone and is set in a near-future world. Shot in 2016, it premiered in Berlin and was a big hit, praised for its action, emotions, and performances. It made lots of money and even got an Academy Award nomination.
title: Logan (film)
